summary: This document is an email chain from November 23, 2021, forwarding a voice message from an individual claiming to have information about Ghislaine Maxwell and to be a friend of George Soros. The message is being referred to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS) for potential follow-up or to provide the caller with crime reporting materials.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: An individual claims to have information about her in a voice message being forwarded to federal prosecutors.

persons.name: George Soros
persons.context: The individual leaving the voice message claims to be a friend of George Soros.

connections.description: An unnamed caller claims to be a friend of George Soros and to have information about Ghislaine Maxwell, implying a potential indirect connection.

events.title: Voice message regarding Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: An individual leaves a voice message claiming to have information about Ghislaine Maxwell and to be a friend of George Soros. The message is forwarded to the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

keyFacts: On November 23, 2021, a voice message from an individual claiming to have information about Ghislaine Maxwell was forwarded to federal prosecutors.
The caller also claimed to be a friend of billionaire philanthropist George Soros.
The email discusses whether to follow up on the tip or simply send the caller crime reporting materials.
The document shows the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York was receiving tips about the Epstein/Maxwell case years after the initial investigations.
